Nipigon.title: Nipigon
Nipigon.byline: Nipigon is a township of 1,500 people (2021) on the north shore of Lake Superior in Northern Ontario.

Nipomo.title: Nipomo
Nipomo.byline: Nipomo is a census designated place in San Luis Obispo County, California.

Nipawin.title: Nipawin
Nipawin.byline: Nipawin is a town of 4,400 (2016) in Northern Saskatchewan.
